Visualize Influenza Microarray Combinato.title: Visualize Influenza Microarray Combinatorics
Visualize Influenza Microarray Combinato.comment: A simple tool for visualizing the way dimensions overlap for a rotation project, looking for commonalities within and between dimensions in individuals infected with disease based on disease, sampled tissue, and sequencing platform

Force Directed Regulon.title: Force Directed Regulon
Force Directed Regulon.comment: A class project experimenting with visualizing the Mycobacterium tuberculosis regulon for controlling metabolic state in aerobic versus anaerobic conditions

Pathogen Gene Mutation Annotation Viewer.title: Pathogen Gene Mutation Annotation Viewer for antibiotic resistance
Pathogen Gene Mutation Annotation Viewer.comment: A tool for visualizing and searching the variant calls and annotations from PathoVar

Simulating Evolution in Competetive Orga.title: Simulating Evolution in Competetive Organisms
Simulating Evolution in Competetive Orga.comment: A class project experimenting with bacterial evolution simulation involving interacting populations and environments

GenePopBuilder.title: GenePopBuilder
GenePopBuilder.comment: An old, unloved population genetics file format that a friend needed a convenient data entry tool for

GlycReSoft2 MS2 Glycopeptide Viewer.title: GlycReSoft2 MS2 Glycopeptide Viewer
GlycReSoft2 MS2 Glycopeptide Viewer.comment: Active work on visualizing glycoproteomics data from targeted Mass Spectrometry and tandem Mass Spectrometry experiments

ng-scientific-notation.title: ng-scientific-notation
ng-scientific-notation.comment: A simple Angular directive for more direct control over rendering numbers in scientific notation
